name: Kiku Kiku Panic
description:
You and up to 3 other friends crank up animal wind up toys to wreck havoc on a cluttered table. Watch as items cheer you on and scream in terror as you send them plummiting off the side. Extreme innovations in one button design allow you to move in a 3D world with only 1 button*! Play as exotic animals such as the narwhale or the Ethiopian mole rat. Compete for high scores earned by clearing the table of happy faces. Download now!

*requires 4 buttons for 4 player split screen mode
